extendedInfo.description: Know your rights! Protect yourself! A Top criminal lawyer created  the ultimate app condensing criminal law into this easy to use app. Cars and cops? Illegal drugs? Under age 21 rules? What's a search? Using 21st century e-book functionalities this masterful app answers every legal question at the touch of your finger.

reviews.comment: Useful and interesting information! Definitely will help me ensure I\'m aware of my rights and ensure I\'m not taken advantage of by corrupt oinkers.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Its okay but too expensive 4 what u get
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Really not worth 9.99 its all stuff that you should already know or can find out for free.
reviews.author: A Google User
